title: DDFP 499: Week 7 Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Osweiler vs. Bradford
itunes:title: DDFP 499: Week 7 Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Osweiler vs. Bradford
description:
Shek is joined by Patrick Claybon, Cynthia Frelund and Matt Harmon to discuss Sam Bradford and Brock Osweiler's matchups against their former teams, the second best team in the AFC and what they are looking forward to watching on TV this weekend. Plus, EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into Italian restaurant, "Thin Slice of Heaven," and the crew reviews an entire menu of appetizers, main courses and desserts describing the biggest Week 7 games in this special edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
